!Merchant of Mammon: The power to move between planes, child! We first used it to travel from Necropolis to Necropolis, but soon augmented our device to allow us travel on a different axis: time itself. We called it 'The Promise of Mammon'. It was the most powerful creation in Aden's history, and a tool that Emperor Shunaiman was granted access to in that contract of ours.
